Module capstone
Package capstone

Class Action

java.lang.Object
capstone.Action
public class Action extends Object
Contains our main program. Executes the menu and contains numerous functions for manipulating Project and Person object data stored in files

      key - the scanner object being used
      Returns:

    • secondaryMenu

      private static void secondaryMenu(ArrayList<Person> personList, ArrayList<Project> projectList, Scanner key, Project current, Connection connection, Statement statement)
      Loops through a menu performing actions on individual project objects
      Parameters:
      projectList - all of our Project objects stored as a list
      personList - all of our Person objects stored as a list
      key - the scanner object being used
      current - Project instance we wish to perform actions on
      statement - interface for our SQL statements
      connection - mySQL database connection object

    • updateProjects

      Parameters:
      projectList - all of our projects stored as a list.
      statement - interface for SQL statements
      current - Project object which we want to perform actions on
      connection - mySQL database connection objects

      Parameters:
      personList - all of our Person objects stored as a list
      statement - interface for our SQL statements
      current - Person object which we want to update
      connection - mySQL database connection object

      erfList - list of Erf objects
      personList - list of Person objects
      Returns:
      list of Project objects

      Parameters:

      erf - string containing the name of the erf
      choice - integer containing our desired choice of Adress/BuildingType
      Returns:
      a list of Project objects

      public static Person displayChoices(List<Person> personList, String role, Scanner key, Statement statement)
      Allows the user to either create a new Person object or choose from existing
      Parameters:
      personList - all of our Person objects stored as a list
      role - string containing the role we are searching for
      key - the scanner object being used
      statement - interface for our SQL statements
      Returns:
      a Person object, either newly created or existing

      Parameters:

      personList - all of our Person objects stored as a list
      statement - interface object to pass SQL statements
      role - string containing the role of a Person object
      Returns:
      a Person object using the captured data

    • roleExists

      private static boolean roleExists(List<Person> personList, String role)
      Checks if Person list contains a Role attribute matching the argument passed
      Parameters:
      personList - all of our Person objects stored as a list
      role - string containing the role we are searching for
      Returns:
      a boolean value of true if list contains any instances with role
